features: Moisturizing Shampoo: Instantly smooths, restores and revitalizes dry hair with lasting moisture for incredibly soft, shiny hair. Suitable for all hair types.
Fragrance Free Shampoo: Our unscented formula is ideal for sensitive skin and those with odor sensitivities or fragrance allergies.
Naturally Derived Ingredients: Enriched with naturally derived botanicals to lock in moisture and nourish dry hair. Toxin-free formula is paraben, sulfate, phosphate and gluten-free.
Cruelty-Free Hair Care: Ginger Lily Farms Club & Fitness collection is PETA-certified, 100% vegan and never tested on animals so you can feel good while using it.

Economical & Eco-Friendly: Commercial refill size helps reduce plastic consumption and is perfect for refilling shower dispensers in locker rooms, health clubs, spas or at home. 1 Gallon (128 fl. oz.)
body.description: Ginger Lily Farms Club & Fitness Fragrance-Free Moisturizing Shampoo is formulated with aloe. Recommended for commercial use in locker rooms and home use for refills. Moisturizing shampoo smooths, restores and revitalizes hair with lasting moisture for incredibly soft, shiny hair. For all hair types. Paraben, sulfate, phosphate, gluten and cruelty-free. 100% vegan.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ginger Lily Farms is the leader in recharge personal care products and is made with the best ingredients to give your body natural delight. All products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free, and PETA certified. Most contain natural fragrances with no artificial colors or colorants. The Ginger Lily Farms Club & Fitness collection is specially designed for commercial facilities seeking exceptional value and quality. Ginger Lily Farms Club & Fitness Ginger Lily Farms Club & Fitness Hydrating Shampoo softens, restores and revitalizes hair with long-lasting moisture for incredibly soft and shiny hair. Formulated with naturally derived botanical ingredients to hydrate and nourish dry hair. Free of parabens, sulfate, phosphate and gluten. Suitable for all hair types. 100% vegan and cruelty free. 4 refreshing scents: Fragrance Free, Aloe Vera, Citrus and Ocean Breeze Naturally derived ingredients Toxin-free formula 100% vegan. Repair dry hair Suitable for all hair types. 1 gallon, 128 fl. oz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent unscented shampoo
reviews.reviewText: My partner has recently become highly sensitive to scents and has been having a hard time finding unscented products. Every other shampoo we’ve found is so expensive! This is the best value we’ve found and they’re quite happy with how it works. It’s a big jug of shampoo, so we just put it into a smaller hand soap pump bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't stink!! Works fine. Mass quantities!
reviews.reviewText: Every time I run out of shampoo, inevitably the brand and "model" of shampoo that I've gotten used to is no longer made, or no longer carried by the store.So I end up wasting what seems like an hour looking at every type of shampoo at the store, trying in vain to find an unscented variety. Every brand puts the indication of what sort of stink they've used in a different place on their label. So you have to read the whole darn bottle only to find that some fine print somewhere proclaims something like: "Long lasting scent". or "Ocean Breeze". or "Forest Rain" or some such annoying drivel.I don't want my hair to reek of some artificial stench. I just want to get the grease out every day and be done with it.I bought this to get an unscented shampoo, and it's pretty much stink-free. It seems to clean rather well, too.It's also a large amount so I won't have to go through the annoyance of searching for an unscented shampoo again for a very long time!Once I tried some of this and found it to be acceptable, I ordered another gallon. I'll probably be dead before I run out of two gallons of this stuff. And that's a GOOD thing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best hydrating shampoo ever!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Functional - meant for large gyms
reviews.reviewText: Cheap and functional. Very little lather. I guess it works. My review of Ginger Lily body wash says the same thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great product but sharp edge
reviews.reviewText: The shampoo cleanses great and having fragrance free is nice cause you can add your own essential oils. However, be careful taking the silver seal off. The plastic on the opening was so sharp it cut my finger to the point it bled. About an inch long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall we like it
reviews.reviewText: There is not much of a scent at all. I don't smell anything but one of my children slightly does. It doesn't lather up great, so we do have to use a bit more than we do with our previous brand. Overall, the price is right, though, even though we have to use a bit more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm glad that I found this. I have MCAS, which means that I'm allergic to a lot of things, including perfume. Thankfully, this doesn't have perfume and no scent whatsoever. I've been using it off and on for a week now without any issues. My hair feels clean and soft. Definitely going to look into buying their lotion by the gallon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this product for our airbnb. Guest love it. We rent it all all seasons so the hunters like it cause there’s no smell. Woman like it cause no chemicals. It’s a win win lol
